mdWarning.name: dss.vector.solutions.ontology.NestedTermsWarning
mdWarning.label: Nested Terms Warning
mdWarning.description: Thrown when Terms for criteria are nested.
mdWarning.message: The following terms have been removed because they are children of other criteria terms:

text.name: nestedTerms
text.label: Nested Terms
text.description: A formatted printout of the terms that are nested.

mdParameter.name: termIds
mdParameter.label: Term Ids
mdParameter.description: A list of Term ids to check against one another for nested relationships.
